notification.title: Notification
notification.description: Displays a **notification** when the soft tabs length setting is applied to one of your files. Note that this notification will be displayed once, when opening the file.

hideIndentGuide.title: Hide the indent guide
hideIndentGuide.description: Indicates if the package **override the editor indentation guide styles** to hide the indentation bar. As the package is using the indentation guide to inject specific styles into the editor, you won't be able to see it until you turn off this setting.

softTabsLength.title: Soft tabs length
softTabsLength.description: Number of **virtual spaces** used to display your soft tabs. This package simulates the presence of invisible spaces to represent your soft tabs and will automatically adapt the editor soft tabs length to your needs. By default, the editor `Tab length` value is used.
